name: my-app

scripts.start-examples: npm i && npm run rollup --workspace=virtual-infinite-scroll && npm i && npm start --workspace=examples
scripts.publish-virtual-infinite-scroll: npm i && npm run rollup --workspace=virtual-infinite-scroll && npm login && npm publish --access public

author: Ashutosh Shukla
description: An npm workspace containing the 'virtual-infinite-scroll' package and example projects for testing and running 'virtual-infinite-scroll' locally.
